overview: The subordinates of the demon boss Yang Doo-seok attack the Korean people's wandering village and kidnap young women. Yang Du-seok sends the women to King So-rim, and King So-rim moves the women through his subordinate manager, but the women are taken away by Nakamura's surprise attack. At this time, Geoam appears and defeats Nakamura and Yang Doo-seok, and finds his younger sister In-sil to find a new life.
title: Jungmu Fighting Skills
